Package main

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.RegularPolygon
  • public class RegularPolygon
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Tony Liang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Creates a new default RegularPolygon.
      RegularPolygon​(int numberOfSides, double lengthOfSide)
      Creates a new RegularPolygon given the number of sides and the length of the side.
      RegularPolygon​(int numberOfSides, double lengthOfSide, double centerX, double centerY)
      Creates a new RegularPolygon given the number of sides, the length of the side, and the x and y coordinates of the center of the polygon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Creates a new default RegularPolygon.

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon​(int numberOfSides,
                      double lengthOfSide)
        Creates a new RegularPolygon given the number of sides and the length of the side.
        • If the number of sides is not greater than 3, it will default to 3.
        • If the length of the side is not a nonzero positive number, it will default to 1.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSides - number of sides of the regular polygon
        lengthOfSide - length of each side of the regular polygon

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon​(int numberOfSides,
                      double lengthOfSide,
                      double centerX,
                      double centerY)
        Creates a new RegularPolygon given the number of sides, the length of the side, and the x and y coordinates of the center of the polygon.
        • If the number of sides is not greater than 3, it will default to 3.
        • If the length of the side is not a nonzero positive number, it will default to 1.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSides - number of sides of the regular polygon
        lengthOfSide - length of each side of the regular polygon
        centerX - x-coordinate of the center of the polygon
        centerY - y-coordinate of the center of the polygon
